text: Michael Learned (/my-kel Lern-ed/ born on April 9, 1939, Washington, D.C.) is an American actress. She became well known for playing Olivia Walton for the television series The Waltons in the 1970s. She also starred in other television series and in movies. She was married to actor Peter Donat from 1956 until 1972. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Washington, D.C.
title: Michael Learned
